website_summaries.verdict: This case offers significant protection for your iPad Pro while maintaining a sleek and slim design.
pros: Has handy built-in features, such as a screen protector, hand strap, and metal kickstand
Camera is uncovered for uninterrupted use
Protects iPad against falls, ideal for anyone on the go
cons: Hand strap is better suited for those with large hands

customer_reviews.title: Stand Pin Breaks :-(
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it I'd give it a 4 star. Like the leather strap, swivel and screen cover. Unfortunately, the pop out stand has a cheeeeezzzzzy plastic pin to hold it in place which broke within the week. The pin needs to be steel. No way to fix without replacing the entire back swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Ron L. Schuman

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend for protecting your investment!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the ipad pro 12.9 cover. It is really nice, well constructed and not too heavy. The handgrip on the back makes the ipad very easy to use or carry around. It is about the same weight as an otterbox, but I like this design much better. Overall the screen clarity is good, and it does not seem to affect any of the functions. I am overall very pleased with this product. I travel alot with my ipad and I feel that I will be well protected and the price made it even better. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: The best made iPad, iPad case I have found! These all inclusive cases have served me since they came out! Having the droppsies as I am a little older, I was constantly dropping my iPhone, sometimes breaking the dang screen! I found these New Trent iPad case and I have not had a problem since! The only problem I have had is the screen protector part of the case got very scratched, and was hard to see through. I got this particular case when bought my iPad Pro, 12.9 type 1 . For me this case fills the bill in the major thing I want in my cases , Safety and Protection! Try it you’ll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Capjoe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but Heavy
customer_reviews.text: This protective case works well for the iPad. The screen protector is a seamless part of the case, helping protect the iPad from incidental spills. The lightning port and headphone port both have heavy rubber covers to protect them from moisture. The only openings are for the home key, the speakers, microphone, and camera. The hand strap on the back is sturdy, and allows me to hold it securely in one hand while I walk around. The only downside is the weight. With the case installed, my iPad weighs 2.76 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bequette

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Using Your iPad in the Field
customer_reviews.text: I love my iPad Pro. But is so expensive I was afraid to use it to its full potential in the field adjusting insurance claims. This case was EXACTLY what I needed. It is SOLID. My hand slips into strap in the back. I can rotate to landscape or portrait. My other hand is free to work the screen either by touch or by Apple pencil. The case doesn't interfere with any functions. It also has a fully rotatable kickstand for movie watching or reading on a table or bed. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Howard

customer_reviews.title: This is a tank and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I would so encourage you to buy this product because it is like a tank,takes so much repetitive abuse and protects my tablet so well. Please buy this if you care about your tablet, mine takes so much abuse and it is still going strong after so much on and off activity.Buy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for server work
customer_reviews.text: Had to rip the cheap a$$ scream protector off which most likely won't help with any spills but my iPad Pro couldn't recognize my screen touch with it in place. The screen protector does come out with a little force and prayer. I thought the frame was gunna snap while ripping the protector out but it survived.
customer_reviews.author: thedannyd

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this case to any and all! I have an older model on my iPad Air and it has performed with excellence. The only issue I had was after about 2 years the stand on the back broke, but the handle and case are still in great shape. I have no reason to expect anything different in this case. They do appear to have improved the sensitivity of the volume pads so you don’t have to press as hard to get them to work. I bought this case to go on my new iPad Pro. Otherwise I would not have needed a new one. Excellent case for really good price. Happy happy repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ross

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed when this arrived. I cannot believe after all the excellent reviews, 4 1/2 stars. It’s not possible to type with the cover. The case also will not close with the iPad in it. But most of all there is the difficulty of typing, or trying to type. I wish this did not have a screen protector but was just a case that fit around the perimeter.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous88

customer_reviews.title: Works but with quirks
customer_reviews.text: While it does fit the Pro, the leather strap is mostly useless. The stand works well when out but if feels like you are going to break it trying to get it in so I rarely close it. I've had better products work on the smaller iPad's, I'll continue to use this until they make a larger unit to support the 12.9Pro. Would I recommend it, yes/no... pretty pricey to use till something better comes along. But other options are limited, so you choose.
customer_reviews.author: rocdawop

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Went together pretty easy except for the power button. It took a little adjusting, but I got the rubber piece in place and it’s all good. There’s two random holes cut in the front that I have no idea of their purpose, but they don’t seem to have a negative affect. The handle works fine and the Apple Pencil works fine through the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: David L Gerhardt

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: My favorite feature about this high quality case is the sturdy kick stand that can be rotated for portrait or landscape view. It's easy to put the case on the ipad after watching a Youtube video, the ipad is completely protected front and back from the potential of being dropped by grandchildren (or me). The volume, ear bud and charging ports are easily accessible. It's not more bulky than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice iPad Case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case. Easy to install, works great in portrait (reading) or landscape (watching movies), much lighter than my other cases, and the strap for your hand works great at any angle. The only thing that could make this better would be some flip outs on the edges to raise it up off the strap when you set it on a table, or don't need the higher angle, but other then that it's great!!. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: NIIIIIIIIIICE
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact you can use the kickstand in portrait or landscape mode. It seems pretty sturdy. Only wish I could use a screen protector in conjunction with the case. Or, the plastic screen included with the case should have been impact glass.I tried and although it fit, no problem, the touch screen was not easy to use. You had to press with significant pressure which defeats the purpose of APPLE products. I'm concerned if the iPad drops at an angle and the screen is impacted, it's over:( Overall, I'm happy with the case and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great case for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good case for your iPad Pro. It's a really good fit and you can do quite a few things with it. It's great for art and setting on your table and playing games so you don't hurt your wrists. All and all I would say this is a good case. I will say that the screen protector is kind of weird and I opted to remove mine.
customer_reviews.author: valamir

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the case too and had hoped it would last
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case for less than a month and the stand has already broken on it and I am so careful with my electronics. Very frustrating. I really liked the case too and had hoped it would last. I feel it should be replaced considering this was suppose to be a long lasting case. Would like seller to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice if you want a grip handle for presentations
customer_reviews.text: I selected this one since I wanted a grip handle. So far, I am not disappointed. It's not that easy to put on (and the instructions were not very well written), but once it's on, it is snug, functions well, and the handle works great. The protective screen seems a bit cheap and unnecessary, and I may end up removing it. I did a lot of research before buying this product, and so far that seems to be paying off. BTW, other companies seem to make similar (and perhaps even better products), but not yet for the 12.9-inch iPad Pro. So choices are somewhat limited at this point.
customer_reviews.author: F. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Really nice case by New Trent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my husband’s new iPad, knowing “oops”(Mr accident prone) would need better drop protection than a regular sleeve cover. This New Trent model is sturdy, good protection coverage, and iPad Is fully functional without issues/good fit. He loves the leather handle on the back, and the stand feature is nice and sturdy. My iPad case is wearing out, i believe this will be my next cover. I’ve owned New Trent products before, and have always been pleased with the quality and reasonable prices.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Best protection w/ flaws
customer_reviews.text: This case is solid but the holding stand mechanisms are flawed. I brought one months ago and in a few weeks the hooks that hold the metal when you stand it up broke making the stand unusable. I thought I may have been rough with it and purchased another one. I was super sensitive with the second one and the same thing happened. So now I know it’s the mechanism of the stand opening and closing under the hand holder that is the issue
customer_reviews.author: carolyn v robinson

customer_reviews.title: works well for shock and drop.
customer_reviews.text: I've had my ipad for 4 years without a scratch and within a month of putting this on the protective coating has a scratch. I feel like if you are going to cover up my screen you should do it with something at least as durable. One feature that would be nice is a place to store my pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Moylan

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I got it for my daughter and she is really big into graphic design she said that it helps keep it steady her and enjoys having that it can stand up while she does her work as well. We’ve had it for quite a while and have never had any issues with it would recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: J Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Good case, after a slight mod
customer_reviews.text: Great for holding and using the large iPad one-handed. Already had a screen protector adhered to the iPad, and the additional layer that's built into this case made the touch sensitivity awful. I was able to remove the one from the case without too much hassle, and it's all good now.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I cannot think of a negative thing to say about this product
customer_reviews.text: Title speaks for itself, this item is great. I had a generic cover for my iPad pro before and it dropped the the screen cracked in the corner. I used this case with the iPad until i fixed the screen. Because of the way its constructed it covered the corner where the chip was. It also has a screen protector attached to it so the screen stayed protected. Once i fixed the screen i have continued to use this product because it protects the iPad so well. I have no fear of anything going on if i drop it.
customer_reviews.author: etchu

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Been a year so far of daily use and no problems. I’m impressed. Haven’t dropped it or been rough with it so can’t speak to the ruggidization aespect so much. Was curious if the strap would hold up but it has. I like how I can rotate the stand upside down and still plug in while using the iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Love. Good protection & waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this case for my iPad Pro. It is water-resistant, the fingerprint still works, the rotating stand is awesome, the hand strap is quality material (and adjustable!), and I can easily use Procreate and all of my other art apps without interference.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Great protection needs kickstand redesign
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection for my 2nd generation iPad 12.9 inch. Built in screen protection with good armor protection from drops. The major design flaw is the kick-stand feature on this protector. The anchor for this part is not thick plastic with metal pins. It seems that the size/weight of this tablet was not taken into consideration over time. This is my second one of this exact product. I love the overall design/features of this platform but the flaw is the kick-stand
customer_reviews.author: ManOf SinCity

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my standard iPad a few months ago. When I upgraded to the iPad Pro, I immediately ordered another for that. I work in construction and love the leather strap for holding it securely while walking around job sites. The stand is great both for working on the go or for just watching tv or reading in bed. My iPad Pro didn’t feel complete until this case arrived today and I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Radarchick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent  Overall case
customer_reviews.text: I had already purchased one of these cases for my smaller iPad, and I love it. So it was a no brainer to purchase one for my iPad Pro 12.9 inch. It fits my iPad Pro like a glove. I love the handle in the back. It is really a high end case, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JC N AZ

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for ipad air and loved the concept of one unit that encompassed screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for ipad air and loved the concept of one unit that encompassed screen protector, case and stand all in one so when I bought the ipad pro 12.9", I looked at others but came right back to this case and bought the larger one. It is rugged and totally protects the product with no worries. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: "This case is Tough"
customer_reviews.text: I am editing my review upward. Originally I had not realized that the blue screen I saw and the sticky home key were a film that covered the inside of the case. That film that I thought was a part of the case made this case 'unuseable' for me. Now that I have taken the film off and cleaned around the home key area, this case is much better. It does fit my 12.9" iPad well. I am still not going to give it a 5-star because I have not tried charging through the case, and I have not yet tried using a cabled keyboard or earphones with it yet. But everything else does work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous357

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.text: This was incredibly heavy and the position of the hand grip was inconvenient. I've seen this kind of product for smaller iPads and was excited to get one, but I was not satisfied with this at all. I returned the product immediately.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Overall the best case without a keyboard with a couple frustrating items
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Trent iPad case. I love the Trent case although there are two frustrating design issues that others have brought up in other reviews, the fragility of the pin on the kick stand and the difficulty of pushing the iPad on and off button. I took a razor and cut out the hard plastic covering the on-off button that solved that problem.
customer_reviews.author: jmcmorris

customer_reviews.title: The case will definitely fit both generations 1 and 2 of the iPad Pro 12.9 inch series. Installation was literally a snap!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive attention to detail. This case was a perfectly snug fit for my iPad Pro 12.9 inch 2nd generation. I was surprised with the reasonable price, because of the quality of the materials. The design is well thought out. The handle is thick leather, yet soft and comfortable. The retractable kick stand is metal with magnets to hold it in the retracted position. I’m very happy I purchased this case to protect my valuable iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Plantener

customer_reviews.title: great for a handheld platform
customer_reviews.text: Great rugged durability for protecting sensitive electronics. Built in screen protector was too thick for the touch sensitivity I prefer so i've adapted the product by cutting out the built in and opted for a normal stick on screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: toby russell

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made, strong, durable but still not bulky or heavy. Kick stand is strong and perfect viewing angle and the handy strap is great for walking around taking notes or viewing in while in tighter spaces like planes. All functions work perfect and has no effect on the touch screen and actually improves the volume when using the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: NickB_Carlsbad

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy - faulty manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: For a couple months this case was great, but then the arm that holds the kick stand out broke and now it's useless. I was very excited about this case initially, as it was one of the only cases with a hand grip. The case was recommended by a colleague. Within days of each other, both cases broke at the same spot. Coincidentally, I saw a floor manage at Costco with the same case. I asked how she liked it and get this, her's broke in the same spot too. That's three people. The only people I know with the case. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Balendy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I can rest easier now...
customer_reviews.text: upgraded iPad to new pro 12.9 in model and needed a new case. Gave this one a try and it seems to be working beautifully. I especially like the leather hand slip feature that allows me to easily use to make presentations when talking to people or givings speeches from a podium. Also the protection of my $1000 investment gives me peace of mind, this is money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Raymond E Smith

customer_reviews.title: Handle on the back side is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looking for an iPad Pro 12.9" case that can be used on the go? This is the one that we are happy with: with a built-in (rotating!) handle and kickstand, it is easy to support with one hand while the other uses the app. A little challenging to assemble, but it's my impression that cases with good protection are like that. Just got these, so can't speak to long-term durability, but appears well built, so we have high hopes in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Tre C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am in love. The leather handle is comfortable and feels very secure in my hand. It was easy to install. I love the little kickstand in the back. My only concern is that overtime could the leather strap stretch out? When you receive it it comes as tight as it’s able. I do wish I could just take it up a little bit more. But overall I am 100% delighted I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Boxerk

customer_reviews.title: Tame your 12.9 IPAD
customer_reviews.text: The 12.9” IPAD is hefty but the New Trent protective case makes it easy to hold. The case is extremely sturdy with a good interlocking seal. This is a very sturdy, durable case.
customer_reviews.author: Donald C. Brunell

customer_reviews.title: Unable to press OFF button
customer_reviews.text: Overall good product. Number one problem is the stiffness of the case that prevents using the top button on the iPad to activate sleep mode or power off, much less take a screenshot. It is also quite difficult to remove the outer case. Otherwise, I am pleased with the stand and the hand strap and the general sturdiness of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Withstood a 425lb electric wheelchair running over
customer_reviews.text: *Ipad didn't make it but the case didn't crack. Only flaw is the stand isn't easy to use and breaks after repeated use. but the handle on it is awesome, especially for the bigger pad
customer_reviews.author: Amy A. Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Covers ambient light sensors completely
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the ambient light sensor holes in this case do not line up with the ambient light sensors on the iPad Pro 2. Therefore, the screen on the ipad stays super dark at all times, and you cannot even tell that the screen is on if you are in a light room. Very frustrating. Overall quality seems good, if it weren't for the sensor issue, this case would have a 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Poor design quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a Gen 2 iPad Pro 12.9 and the holes at the top of the case for the iPad's light sensors don't line up with the sensors... so the sensors are covered, resulting in the iPad acting as if it's in total darkness. This means the brightness must be changed manually when going between light and dark environments. Poor design quality.
customer_reviews.author: US Trinity Energy Services

customer_reviews.title: Fits my ipad like a glove.
customer_reviews.text: Great design solved a big problem for me I am able to manage showing Presentation to a prospect while standing and talking get them to sign e-documents with easy. Adequate protection ‘Looks good
customer_reviews.author: RobertoR

customer_reviews.title: Sketching on location with IPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: Just got this case for Christmas and it has been great to use for casual sketching and drawing with me. Just came back from a great lunch and the waitress saw me using the iPad to sketch with while I was waiting to get my food. It has such a great handle to hold the iPad I feel I can do more sketching on location now.
customer_reviews.author: Michel Hannan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Works well in my classroom. Perfect for walking around the room and taking notes or helping students. I have paired it with an Apple TV so now I can take a snapshot of student work to project to class and student can annotate or explain their work. Love the leather strap. My only problem is that the strap does not adjust small enough for my hands. I have to spread my hands wide in order to rotate iPad. Minor problem for such benefit in the classroom.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case for on the go
customer_reviews.text: I work in corporate events and when I am onsite I need quick access to my iPad to reference floor plans, slide decks, etc. I bought this case prior to working a 170k+ attendee event and it was a life saver! The durable case and leather plan strip were just what I needed so I could use my iPad while on the go. Colleagues were impressed with the design and how easy it was for me to use my iPad. The case fits great, but can be a little challenging to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great case, just what the doctor ordered. Easy to hold, clear and protective.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy....right out of the box I knew it would be a good solution. I view Construction Drawings on construction sites all day long and holing an iPad Pro while pointing and walking around is very difficult. Easy one-hand holding and then I go back to the construction trailer and can set it on its arm in profile or landscape to get my work done. Very happy I dumped the Apple case and bought this one. (I have a $129 apple keyboard/case for sale if anyone wants it!). Thanks New Trent
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Stand breaks
customer_reviews.text: We Bought three of these for our kids iPads. They lasted exactly 6 months within a couple weeks of each other. All 3 of the stands in the back of the case broke, in the exact same spot . I do not recommend this case!!
customer_reviews.author: Brady Lady

customer_reviews.title: An excellent high quality product
customer_reviews.text: An excellent protective case, with well thought out features and strength. A good investment. Don't wait to break your iPad like I did by letting it slide off the edge of a counter. Watching it fall was like watching a train wreck. The replacement is now in this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Road King

customer_reviews.title: Best ipad case to own. But.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this case, i have own a total of 4 of this case two in ipad air and two in ipad pro 12 inch. All is good the only problem that need to change is the stand if you put it up and accidentally press down on it it will come loose and cant be fix, this go to normal wear and tear. Since it connects to the case you can not change it without changing the case. Other then that it is a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Hung N.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice case.
customer_reviews.text: I personally do not use it, but I purchase supplies for our veterinary clinic. And, my manager absolutely loves this case, as she can hold the IPAD perfectly with ease. She said with the hand strap and the stand both built in, the IPAD has become very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Don Fowler

customer_reviews.title: changes were not for the better.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd ipad case from you. the changes on the buttons, the little pointy things i popped off. very annoying. the kickstand does not slide back or retract without having to stretch the leather hand strap. definitely a step down from my other 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and perfect for sales presentations
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Tight seal. Great product. I use this for work as a sales rep so the stand is great for making one on one presentations. I also use the hand strap when I’m doing stand up presentations and it’s comfortable for my small hands. I’ve dropped it several times as I use it all day, everyday and the case is extremely protective and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Well rounded and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really liked the case so far. The stand is sturdy metal and the rotation of it is easy to maneuver. I use my device at work which requires that I walk around with it so having the hand strap makes me confident I’m not going to just drop it if someone bumps into me (or if I’m having a clumsy moment.) the case also has cutouts for the speakers so the sound quality hasn’t been affected. Overall, this fits my specific needs very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wendt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Plastic for case could be slightly thicker I was afraid I was going to break it while preparing it for my ipad 12.9. However, I'm sure the majority of the money spent on the manufacturing of this product went towards to NICE Swivel Strap & stand. I personally pulled the clear screen cover out because I'm already using a tempered glass protector. Overall I'm extremely pleased with this case :)
customer_reviews.author: Sldr4gzus

customer_reviews.title: I loved the case at first
customer_reviews.text: I loved the case at first. Purchased it at the beginning of August. However, the kick stand broke on it today. After 7 months. When I pay $42 for something, I expect it to last more than 7 months. Very disappointed. That was one of the major reasons I purchased this particular case.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful case that is practical and makes carrying simple and safe. I chose this case because it has a stand that rotates 360 degrees, a sturdy leather hand strap for toting, and because it’s durable. It is very functional for me as I travel to the schools in my school district. I greatly recommended this case for those who are on the go and don’t always have time to whip out a laptop really quickly. I have also received compliments regarding how stylish it is. I have had ZERO PROBLEMS!!! GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Prothaniel S Harris

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This item fits my iPad perfectly and is just what I wanted. The leather handle thingy was questionable to me at first, but now I love the feature. The glass cover was great to have as well.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasyluvr

customer_reviews.title: The case is a snug fit and pretty sleek - has a professional look
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the case is very convenient & was a big part in my purchasing decision. The case is a snug fit and pretty sleek - has a professional look. I work in construction/real estate & use my iPad on job sites, so having the included screen cover was also another benefit. So far I love the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best case ever for an iPad Pro. It is better than I had ever imagined it. Comfort, ease-of-use, feels sturdy. Included glass protection. Very happy with my purchase, will most likely purchase another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: JeffK888

customer_reviews.title: Poor IPad stand
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a month or so. The case itself is good and will protect the iPad. The issue is the stand, when it broke, the whole thing is useless. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: Don't Purchase Unless intend to Walk Around with it on Your Hand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a waste of money. The case does not have a cover resulting in the screen always being exposed to the elements and the metal stand scratches furniture. Don't buy it unless you intend to walk around with it attached to your hand; which some may have applications for.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this over and over again!
customer_reviews.text: Feels durable, comfortable to the touch and very easy to put together. The material feels and looks good. The stand and strap in the back works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE !
customer_reviews.text: ipad is used by a mom and a couple of toddlers. has been accident free and well protected with this case.
customer_reviews.author: pretz

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the BEST IPAD case of all time
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the BEST IPAD case of all time. Stand and strap work awesome, and the case wraps up your IPAD like a snuggly blanket. This thing protects every single inch of your Ipad, and does not compromise functionality at all, makes it easier to use actually. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely handy
customer_reviews.text: A great protective product for the iPad. Really good if you need to use your iPad and show others what you are doing. Excellent hand hold on the back and a convenient bottle opener in the stand
customer_reviews.author: bwhyte

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is like having an Otterbox cover with the convenience of having a strap handle to rest your hand in as you hold the IPad. My hubby loves how well balanced it feels and he especially likes how you don't have all that weight of the 12 plus inches IPad wearing on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: This covers all of my needs! It fits perfectly, it gives great protection, the back strap makes it very easy to hold and the stand sits it up at a perfect angle
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the Griffin Survivor I was using. This case seems to fit better, more securely, as well as offer more complete protection than the more expensive case I replaced. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: SandC

customer_reviews.title: Solid case with back handle
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a case with a handle in the back. This is perfect for my needs. The iPad can be held vertical or horizontal. The case is very rugged. One issue is that I use it with my Mac with the program Astropad. The case allows the lightening connector but Astropad now makes a wireless Bluetooth connector which doesn't fit when the case is on. I would buy this case again despite this.
customer_reviews.author: CHW

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the price - my iPad definitely feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price - my iPad definitely feels safe. The case is durable and able to withstand the rigors of a job site. The handle is ergonomic and the stand adds an additional versatility. The touch functionality was restricted somewhat by the screen cover so I removed it with a craft knife and added a peel off screen protector instead. Definitely recommended - there is nothing else like this on the market for this particular size iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Brunsdon

customer_reviews.title: Not made for iPad Pro 12.9”!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was false advertising. This is no where close to fitting the new iPad Pro 12.9”. Your case is too big. Nothing lined up. What a waste of my time and money. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Danis Lis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Using my Ipad in the Field!
customer_reviews.text: Great rugged case I use in the field with my Ipad when I am on the go. The only complaint I would have is that the power button is quite difficult to press in the case but overall a great value and a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Dre

customer_reviews.title: It offers full protection with screen protector
customer_reviews.text: The case was a lot less expensive than at local retailer. It fit perfectly but does make the iPad a lot heavier. It could only had been better if came in purple
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Austin

customer_reviews.title: wrap my PRO
customer_reviews.text: I like the purchase. Can be tough to install if you are not DIY inclined. Works great for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: Best Mix Event Support

customer_reviews.title: Great Ipad Case
customer_reviews.text: Remove the plastic screen protector and use your on tempered glass one makes this the ultimate case when going on in the field
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty & Protected
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I needed some thing to protect my iPad Pro and found this online. I really like the rotating leather hand strap and kick stand. Was easy to install my iPad Pro into the case and now I feel well protected.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple years now and still holding string. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: the best in protection and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second New Trent iPad case. My first generation iPad case was used daily for over a year and was durable - save me several times from a cracked screen or case - and I loved the high quality leather strap. My new Pro 129 case is much better -- more protection with quality bumper, better stand functionality, screen cover and same fantastic strap. The very best...
customer_reviews.author: normarks

customer_reviews.title: Stable, well built case
customer_reviews.text: It fits well. Definitely makes the iPad heavier, but really you choose weight or protection with an iPad this size.
customer_reviews.author: Planet

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for your iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: Although weighty, this case provides the protection needed for my $1200 investment. The backstrap is great for note taking on the go. Thing missing is a clip for my Apple Pencil. All in all, a fantastic case!
customer_reviews.author: World Peas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made like a tank. I really like the built in stand. The leather handle takes the bulk out of the 12" pro iPad.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pike

customer_reviews.title: The only case you need!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this case...it's very sturdy and easy to use! Excellent customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: aloha_kids2

customer_reviews.title: Crazy good
customer_reviews.text: The engineering, materials, and quality control are amazing. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Keith F.

customer_reviews.title: IPad pro case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It is very helpful for my Business because I'm constantly moving around so it helps that it can be sat up or held with one hand carefully.. Thank you 💞
customer_reviews.author: Timika Knox

customer_reviews.title: good protection.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good protection, strong. The iPad is well protected from de shock. The avantage of the integrated screen protector is that you do not have to buy one. I do not know if it is very protective against water. 2 holes on each side of the camera. It is easy to hold quite heavy, looks durable. I like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Able to hold iPad with one hand while working. Hand strap makes operating the stand a little difficult. Otherwise, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Grady Bilberry

customer_reviews.title: Working great!
customer_reviews.text: I like that i can go from portrait to landscape view. Rotating the view is simple. I can carry it with me to an inspection and keep it my hand safely to write notes.
customer_reviews.author: MaryT

customer_reviews.title: IPad Pro case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case! Better than the expensive brands that I have owned before!
customer_reviews.author: zubbie

customer_reviews.title: Good case, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Good case durable, I've read some had problems with the stand so I was skeptical but I've used this for months now and I think it works just fine. Some people go through multiple phones a year I tend to take care of mine so that may play a factor but over all a good durable case.
customer_reviews.author: AirplaneMX

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, easy install. Handle is a plus along with the stand. Bought for 2 different Ipad pro's. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: MartyJD

customer_reviews.title: Total protection
customer_reviews.text: Total protection for my 12.9 iPad. Case has a screen protector that works well.
customer_reviews.author: Randall zitch

customer_reviews.title: Tilt portion breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: Tilt section broke very fast, hat to go to OTTERBOX COVER!
customer_reviews.author: Xman

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: We like the strap feature to hold it and love the fact that it can stand up as well. We would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: My cell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and easy to set up!!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, protective and great extras like the hand strap and arm stand. And the icing was the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many New Trent items over the years. They have always proven to be well made and meet or exceed expectations. The only wish for the iPad 12.9 case is that it had a holder for the Apple Pen.
customer_reviews.author: SC Ried

customer_reviews.title: Item broke a week after using it.
customer_reviews.text: The item broke in the first week. The plastic clips that hold the stand in place completely broke off. I communicated my disappointment to seller- just requesting an exchange. Thinking in all fairness maybe I just received a defective one- so, I was willing to try another one before rating the item. Received a response from the seller requesting photos. Sent photos and now I wait. Meanwhile, I could have purchased something for immediate use elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Haag

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Hard to answer many questions on durability as I have only had it two weeks. Been through about 50 cases. Hands down the best one I have had yet!
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Hatfield

product_meta.title: New Trent iPad Case for iPad Pro 12.9 case 2nd Generation, Heavy Duty Full-Body Rugged ipad 12.9 Case, Built-in Screen Protector, for Old Model 1st & 2nd Generation ONLY, NOT for 3rd Gen iPad Pro
feature_bullets: Rugged iPad Pro 12.9 Case 2nd generation case , built with Premium Leather Hand Strap, Can use one hand to hold iPad Pro 12.9 effortlessly
Special iPad Pro 2nd generation 12.9 Case with 360 Degree Rotation Kickstand allow you to view iPad Pro 12.9 in horizontal and vertical directions
Unique iPad 12.9 Case with built-in screen protector to protect your ipad Pro 1st generation and iPad pro 12.9 from scratches
Rugged ipad pro 12.9 case 2017 built with Two layer PUT material and Raised Edges for the Maximum Protection to For shock resistance
The Strong iPad Pro 12.9 1st generation case provides maximum protection with full access to ports and volume control
